Test Name: Collapsin Response-Mediator Protein-5 (CRMP-5) Neuronal IgG Titer, Spinal Fluid
Purpose: To determine the CRMP-5 Neuronal IgG titer in spinal fluid to aid in diagnosing certain neurological conditions.
Equipment: ELISA reader, CRMP-5 IgG ELISA kit, micropipettes with disposable tips, plate washer, incubator
